cause.description:
Hello, my name is Mike Jones. I like to sing. I like to sing so much, I plan to make it my career. I like to sing jazz, I like to sing essentially anything asside from country or R&B. I'm looking for a band, but it's hard for me to practice with bands without proper equipment, which is why I am asking you to find a way to make some form of contribution to my cause. I would pony up for my own, if I had the money or the means. As a Chem. Engineering student in college I won't have time to have a job that will create excess income enough for me to purchase a PA. Equipment, advice, or funds are always helpful. If you can't contribute one of these, at least invite others to this group. The more that know, the more that I might reach.
If you worry that you'd be wasting your help on me, I, and my local reputation can assure you that this is a valid plea.
I will post pictures with receipts and gear as proof
Half of the proceeds will be given to a Kansas City Music charitee of my choice.
1. I love to rock.
2. I wanna rock.
3. I've gotta rock!
cause.mission: Help the progression of the true creativity in music.
cause.name: Save the Music: Help Mike Jones buy a PA system
